metadata.name: Reflejo 1/30
metadata.description:
Video for the song "Reflejo" by the artist Kasbeel. "Reflejo is a song about empowerment, looking at oneself and recognizing the power you see when you stare at your Reflection. I wrote it in a moment when I felt nothing could do me harm. Even if people were out to get me, my strength is swift, my will is strong and nothing can hurt me" - Kasbeel

The technical aspects of this mint come from a series of conclusions from recent research studies about onchain splits. Creative endeavors are multiplayer in nature. However, Web 3 is still working on tools that allow for a user-friendly experience for multiplayer deployment and management of digital assets. This mint is part of these conclusions as it goes through the process of deploying this piece of intellectual property, with the original creators having consensus and using split mechanisms for fair pay of collaborators, hoping to illustrate what is possible right now with the technology that is available. In this test the contract and the split contract are deployed by the artist multi-sig meaning all splits have been consensually approved.

The split contract includes the original creators, the artist multi-sig that acts as a treasury for the project to pay back unrecouped investments, and a contributor for marketing services.
